mapper.select: select o.ID as id, o.Order_id as orderid, o.Tower_wx_id as towerwxid, o.Tower_first_fee as towerfirstfee, o.Tower_end_fee as towerendfee, o.Tower_id as towerid, o.Tower_fee as towerfee, o.Tower_ht_id as towerhtid, o.Tower_delay_reason as towerdelayreason, s.statename as towerstatename, o.Tower_state as towerstate, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time , 120 ) as toweraddtime, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_end_date , 120 ) as towerendtime, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_abandon_time , 120 ) as towerabandontime, t.Tower_name towername, c.City_name as towercityname, c.ID as towercityid, a.area_name as towerareaname, t.Tower_level as towerlevelid, case t.Tower_level when 1 then '一级站址' when 2 then '二级站址' when 3 then '三级站址' when 4 then '四级站址' end as towerlevel, t.Tower_j as towerj, t.Tower_w as towerw, t.Tower_info as towerinfo, t.Tower_manager as towermanager, t.Tower_manager_name as towermanagername, p.Tower_type_name as towertypename, t.Tower_rent_fee as towerrentfee, (isnull(o.Tower_target_gps,'')+' '+o.Tower_target_address) as towertargetaddress, case o.Tower_power_type when 1 then '直供电' when 2 then '转供电' end as towerpowertypename, o.Tower_power_price as towerpowerprice, o.Tower_power_t as towerpowert, o.Tower_fact_fee as towerfactfee, o.Tower_three_ht as towerthreeht, o.Tower_fact_rent_fee as towerfactrentfee, o.Tower_ht_imag as towerhtimag, o.Tower_file as towerfile, o.Tower_fact_address as towerfactaddress, o.Tower_yz_name as toweryzname, o.Tower_yz_phone as toweryzphone, o.Tower_pj_progress as towerpjprogress, o.Tower_yq_count as toweryqcount, e.admincontent as adminpjcontent, e.usercontent as userpjcontent, e.usertowercontent as userpjtower, r.Con_reject_count as conrejectcount, o.Tower_project_no as towerprojectno, o.Tower_project_name as towerprojectname, o.Tower_fact_gps as towerfactgps from tower_order_detail o left join tower_tower_info t on t.ID=o.Tower_id left join tower_area a on a.ID=t.Tower_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id left join tower_tower_type p on p.ID=t.Tower_type left join tower_order_state s on s.state=o.Tower_state left join tower_order_evaluate e on e.orderid=o.ID left join data_report_tower r on r.Tower_id=t.ID where 1=1 and o.id=#{id}

select u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, a.area_name as userareaname, c.City_name as usercityname, (case u.user_level when 4 then '四级用户' when 3 then '三级用户' when 2 then '二级用户' when 1 then '一级用户' end ) as userlevel, u.User_company as usercompany, b.businessname as userbusiness, oi.Order_count as ordercount, oi.Succ_count as succcount, oi.Ing_count as ingcount, oi.Fail_count as failcount, oi.Cancel_count as cancelcount
from tower_user_info u left join tower_area a on a.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id left join tower_user_order_info oi on oi.Wx_id=u.Wx_id left join tower_user_business b on b.businessid=u.User_business where u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
mapper.update:
update tower_order_detail set
Tower_abandon_time=GETDATE(), Tower_apply_time=NULL,
Tower_ht_id=#{htid}, Tower_ht_imag=#{image}, Tower_first_fee=#{firstfee}, Tower_end_fee=#{endfee},
Tower_file=#{image}, Tower_project_no=#{towerprojectno}, Tower_project_name=#{towerprojectname},
Tower_complete_time=GETDATE(),
Tower_end_date=DATEADD(SECOND,DATEDIFF(SECOND,Tower_apply_time,GETDATE())+#{yqcount}*60*60,Tower_end_date), Tower_apply_time=NULL,
Tower_end_date=DATEADD(SECOND,DATEDIFF(SECOND,Tower_apply_time,GETDATE()),Tower_end_date), Tower_apply_time=NULL,
Tower_state=#{towerstate} where ID=#{orderid} ;

update tower_user_order_info set
Fail_count=Fail_count+#{failcount},
Succ_count=Succ_count+#{succcount},
Ing_count=Ing_count+#{ingcount},
Reject_count=Reject_count+#{rejectcount},
Order_count=Order_count+0 where Wx_id=#{wxid} ;

update tower_user_charge set
Charge=Charge+#{charge},
Get_now=Get_now+#{getnow},
Getting_now=Getting_now+#{gettingnow},
All_geting=All_geting+#{allgetting},
Experience=Experience+#{experience},
Score=Score+#{score},
Wx_id=#{wxid} where Wx_id=#{wxid};
mapper.select: select c.ID as id, c.Wx_id as wxid, c.Charge as charge, c.Get_now as getnow, c.Getting_now as gettingnow, c.All_geting as allgeting, c.Experience as experience, c.Score as score, u.User_level as userlevel from tower_user_charge c left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=c.Wx_id where 1=1 and c.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;

select o.ID as orderid, o.Tower_wx_id as towerwxid, o.Tower_id as towerid, DATEDIFF(hour,GETDATE(),o.Tower_end_date) as towerhour, a.ID as towerarea, c.ID as towercity from tower_order_detail o left join tower_tower_info t on t.ID=o.Tower_id left join tower_area a on a.ID=t.Tower_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id
where 1=1 and (o.Tower_end_date <= GETDATE() or ( DATEDIFF(hour,GETDATE(),o.Tower_end_date) <= 24 and ( o.Tower_send_msg_qy=0 or o.Tower_send_msg_qy is null) ) ) and (o.Tower_state=0 or o.Tower_state=12 or o.Tower_state=14 or o.Tower_state=19 ) ;

select o.ID as orderid, o.Tower_wx_id as towerwxid, t.Tower_name as towername from tower_order_detail o left join tower_tower_info t on t.id=o.Tower_id where 1=1 and o.Tower_state=2 and (o.Tower_send_message=0 or o.Tower_send_message is null) and DATEDIFF (day, (select top(1) i.Order_time from tower_sh_doinfo i where i.Order_id=o.ID and i.Order_state=2 order by i.Order_time desc),GETDATE())>=#{day} ;

select
o.Wx_id as wxid, o.Order_count as ordercount, o.Succ_count as succcount, o.Ing_count as ingcount, o.Fail_count as failcount, o.Cancel_count as cancelcount, o.Concancel_count as concancelcount, o.Time_count as timecount from tower_user_order_info o where o.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
mapper.update:
update tower_user_order_info set Fail_count=Fail_count+1, Ing_count=Ing_count-1,
Time_count=Time_count+1 where Wx_id=#{towerwxid};
mapper.select: select o.Order_id as orderid, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time, 120 ) as toweraddtime, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, s.statename as towerstatename, ua.area_name as userareaname, uc.City_name as usercityname from tower_order_detail o left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=o.Tower_wx_id left join tower_area ua on ua.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city uc on uc.City_id=ua.City_id left join tower_order_state s on s.state=o.Tower_state where 1=1 and o.Tower_id=#{towerid} order by o.Tower_add_time desc ;

select o.Order_id as orderid, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time, 120 ) as toweraddtime, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, s.statename as towerstatename, ua.area_name as userareaname, uc.City_name as usercityname, t.Tower_name as towername from tower_order_detail o left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=o.Tower_wx_id left join tower_area ua on ua.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city uc on uc.City_id=ua.City_id left join tower_tower_info t on t.ID=o.Tower_id left join tower_order_state s on s.state=o.Tower_state where 1=1 and o.Tower_id=#{towerid} order by o.Tower_add_time desc ;
mapper.update: update tower_order_detail set Tower_ht_id=#{towerhtid}, Tower_ht_imag=#{towerhtimag}, Tower_fact_rent_fee=#{towerfactrentfee}, Tower_power_type=#{towerpowertype}, Tower_power_price=#{towerpowerprice}, Tower_power_t=#{towerpowert}, Tower_state=#{towerstate}, Tower_fact_address=#{towerfactaddress}, Tower_yz_name =#{toweryzname}, Tower_yz_phone=#{toweryzphone}, Tower_fact_gps=#{towerfactgps} where ID=#{id} ;
